twievalin, I got it working by unpacking
"500dos.cstm.dk.swe.tms.rar"
with 7ZIP, then right clicked the folder I unzipped it to and opened it in VLC. It worked Like a Video TS I assume and ran smoothly. If you opened the original Folder as a Video TS folder then you would have short clips back to back with a small buffer time in between.

Hope this helps someone. Nice quality too
